description: Entity and relation extraction schema for historical French company documents

DATE.description: Date expression, can be written in various incomplete formats (e.g., '15 mars 1920', 'le trois avril mil neuf cent dix')

ORGANIZATION.description: Full or abbreviated name of an organization (e.g., Société Générale)

LEGAL_STRUCTURE.description: Legal structure of an organization (e.g., société anonyme, société coopérative, société en nom collectif)

MISSION_STATEMENT.description: Business purpose, activity or mission of an organization (e.g., mining, textile trade, banking and credit)

LEGAL_PROCEDURE.description: Legal procedure or action (e.g., 'constitution', 'dissolution', 'liquidation', 'représentation', 'registration au registre du commerce')

REGISTERED_OFFICE.description: Type of registered location for an organization (e.g., corporate office, siège social, siège administratif)

PERSON.description: Person first and last names (e.g., Jean Dupont, Marie Curie)

HONORIFICS.description: Expressions used to address or refer to a person according to social role, status, or level of formality (e.g., m., me, vve, veuve).

PROFESSION.description: Profession independent of organizational mandate (e.g., négociant, rentier, ingénieur)

CORPORATE_TITLE.description: titles given to individuals within a business or organization depending on the role they have and which also portray the duties and responsibilities within that specific role (e.g., président, administrateur, directeur, scrutateur)

SHARE_QUANTITY.description: Number of shares or parts (e.g., '2 000 actions', '500 parts sociales')

SHARE_TYPE.description: Type or form of shares (e.g., au porteur, nominatives)

CAPITAL_TYPE.description: Type of share capital (e.g., capital social, capital libéré, capital souscrit)

ADDRESS.description: street address including street number and name (e.g., numéro 10 rue de la Paix)

BUILDING_NAME.description: Name of building, property, or landmark

ARCHIVAL_REFERENCE.description: Registry or archive reference (e.g., volume, folio, case, number)
